oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Gómez Carmona, Jorge
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: To investigate the development of hydraulic and filtration property of Polyurethane bound porous pavement, by define the particles clogging behaviour within the porous structure subjected to the urban runoff. In the present study, it is hard to quantify the particles concentration of runoff. The test method and equipment for evaluating the clogging and filtration behaviour need to be re-designed and manufactured respectively.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Graduado en Ingeniería de Tecnologías Industriales
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Desarrollo de las Propiedades Hidráulicas del Asfalto con Poliuretano
Development of Hydraulic Properties in PU-Bonded Asphalt
